mapper.select: select * from (select (rank() over(order by Fac_serialnum))r , FAC_serialnum, FAC_NAME,FAC_ADDRESS, FAC_STATUS, FAC_CATEGORY from Facilities ) where r>#{startrownum} and r<=#{endrownum}
mapper.insert: insert into Facilities values((select count(Fac_serialnum)+1 from Facilities),#{fac_name},#{fac_address },#{fac_status},#{fac_category})
